Player History
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2000, hitting .394 with 5 HR, 20 RBI...
Traded from Oakland to San Francisco on 5/8/2000 (Going to SFN: RF J. Dye, P A. Pettyjohn. Going to OAK: LF J. Gonzalez)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/2000, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against St. Louis on 7/19/2000...
Traded from San Francisco to Chicago (N) on 2/28/2001 (Going to CHN: RF J. Dye. Going to SFN: RF J. Whitmarsh, P C. Gissell)...
Drove in 7 runs against Los Angeles on 7/26/2001...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Seattle on 6/23/2002 (Going to SEA: RF J. Dye. Going to CHN: SS S. Brown, 1B D. McPherson)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/2002, hitting .522 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Traded from Seattle to Tampa Bay on 5/9/2005 (Going to SEA: P D. Kile, P T. Harikkala. Going to TB: RF J. Dye, CF C. Ambres, 1B R. Garko)...
Traded from Tampa Bay to Texas on 6/23/2005 (Going to TB: LF M. Holliday, SS T. Pena, P T. Hodges, P B. Hendren, C A. Perez. Going to TEX: SS J. Rollins, P M. Nannini, 2B J. Cantu, RF J. Dye)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2006, hitting .297 with 10 HR, 28 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Boston on 5/1/2006...
Injured on 5/2/2006 with a Inflamed Medial Collateral Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Was selected to the 2006 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/25/2007 with a Fractured Hip, out for 7-8 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (A) on 6/10/2008...
Injured on 8/13/2008 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 4/1/2009 with a Ruptured Achilles Tendon, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/1/2010 to a minor league contract.
Drafted in 4th round, 87th overall pick, by Minnesota in 2011...
Traded from Minnesota to Florida on 2/27/2014 (Going to FLA: C C. Gallagher. Going to MIN: P A. Kubitza)...
Had first career hit on 6/15/2019, off Dylan Bundy (TOR)...
Drafted in 3rd round, 53rd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1977...
Injured on 4/3/1979 with a Blister On Finger, out for 3 days...
Injured on 6/14/1980 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 4/4/1981 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/11/1982 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Released by Pittsburgh on 4/1/1983...
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1985...
Injured on 5/22/1985 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 7/14/1985 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
